block.p: MILGRAM-Sylvia. On October 9, 2000, in Rockville, MD, longtime resident of Manhattan. Beloved sister of Norma Spector and sisterin-law of Paul Spector. Dear aunt of Sarah Spector and Gordon Spector. Former inspiring teacher of Art at Washington Irving High School and Music and Art High School, and fascinating lecturer at the Museum of Modern Art. Memorial service to be announced.

MILGRAM-Sylvia. On October 9, 2000, in Rockville, MD, longtime resident of Manhattan. Beloved sister of Norma Spector and sisterin-law of Paul Spector. Dear aunt of Sarah Spector and Gordon Spector. Former inspiring teacher of Art at Washington Irving High School and Music and Art High School, and fascinating lecturer at the Museum of Modern Art. Memorial service to be announced.
